japanese:
さあ、ついに卒業旅行最終日です！
張り切っていきましょーう！
translation:
Alright then,
it's finally the last day of our graduation trip!
Let's give it our all!

japanese:
ここ、綺麗なところだね。
日本じゃないみたい。
translation:
This place is so beautiful.
It doesn't feel like Japan.

japanese: 白い建物と青い海のコントラスト……。
translation:
The contrast between the white buildings
and the blue sea...

japanese:
まさにリゾートに来たって感じだわ！
ウミカジテラス、いい場所じゃない。
translation:
It really feels like we're at a resort!
Umikaji Terrace is such a great spot.

japanese:
ああ、ここも海外っぽいが
アメリカンビレッジとはまた違った趣だな。
translation:
Yeah, this place also feels like we're overseas!
But it has a different atmosphere from
American Village.

japanese: 沖縄って、本当に色々な楽しみ方があるんだ。
translation: There are so many different ways to enjoy Okinawa.

japanese:
ねえ、みんな？
本当に良かったの？
今日は海水浴とバーベキューの予定だったのに。
translation:
Hey, everyone?
Are you really okay with this?
Today was supposed to be for beach-going and barbecuing.

japanese:
いいんですよ。
一花はまだ大事を取ったほうがいいでしょうし、
みんなで決めたことなんですから。
translation:
It's fine. You should still take care,
and we all agreed on this plan.

japanese: 一花は気にしすぎなのよ。
translation: You're worrying too much.

japanese:
つーか、別に一花に気を遣っただけで
ここに来たわけじゃないぞ？
translation:
And we didn't come here
just to accommodate you, Ichika.

japanese: え？　そうなの？
translation: Huh? You didn't?

japanese:
ああ、俺たちはまだ
この旅行でやり残してることがあるからな！
translation:
Yeah, there are still things
we haven't done on this trip.

japanese: やり残してること……。
translation: Things we haven't done...

japanese: あっ、記念品探し！
translation: Ah, our souvenir search!

japanese:
そうだ！
お揃いの記念品、まだ見つけられてないだろ？
translation:
That's right!
We still haven't found matching souvenirs for us yet.

japanese:
そっか、そうだった。
確かにバーベキューどころじゃなかったよ。
translation:
That's true.
We don't have time for a barbecue anyway.

japanese: そういうこと。
translation: That's right.

japanese:
ここは様々なお店がありますから、
記念品探しにはうってつけです。
translation:
This place has a variety of shops,
so it's perfect for a souvenir search.

japanese:
というか、今日中に見つけないと。
明日の午前中には飛行機に乗るんだから。
translation:
Plus, we have to find them today.
We're flying out tomorrow morning.

japanese:
だね！
よーし、気合い入れて探すぞー！
translation:
Exactly! Right,
let's put some effort into finding them!

japanese:
ふわぁ～、どこからでも海が見える！
景色を眺めてるだけで楽しいね。
translation:
Wow, you can see the ocean from anywhere you look!
It's fun just to gaze at the scenery.

japanese: 遠くを見ながら歩いてると迷子になるわよ？
translation:
If you walk while looking into the distance,
you'll get lost, you know?

japanese:
はっ、確かに気をつけないと。
らいはちゃん、手を繋ぎましょうか？
translation:
Ah, you're right, I have to be careful.
Raiha-chan, should we hold hands?

japanese: 大丈夫だよ、そこまで子どもじゃないからね。
translation: No thanks, I'm not a kid anymore.

japanese: ……あら？　上杉君は？
translation: ...Oh? Where's Uesugi-kun?

japanese:
あれ、いない！？
まさか上杉さんが迷子に？
translation:
Huh? He's not here?!
Could it be that Uesugi-san got lost?

japanese: 捜しに行く？
translation: Shall we go look for him?

japanese:
フータロー君なら大丈夫でしょ。
ふらっと戻ってくるって。
translation:
Futaro-kun will be fine.
He'll come back on his own.

japanese: ……ふふっ。
translation: ...Hehe.

japanese: ん？　なに、五月ちゃん。
translation: Hmm? Do you have anything to say, Itsuki-chan?

japanese:
いえ、一花は上杉君のことを
心から信頼しているのだな、と思いまして。
translation:
No, I was just thinking that
you really trust Uesugi-kun, Ichika.

japanese:
確かにそんな顔してたわねぇ。
彼はちゃんと私のとこに帰ってくるって余裕な顔。
translation:
Yeah, you had that look on your face.
You looked so calm and confident
that he would come back to you.

japanese:
わ、私、そんな顔してた？
なんか恥ずかしい……。
translation:
D-did I have that look on my face?
That's embarrassing...

japanese:
ねえ、一花。
フータローとの生活はどうだった？
translation: Hey, Ichika, how is it living with Futaro?

japanese: そ、そうだね……。
translation: W-well...

japanese:
楽しかった、かな。
それが一番。
やっぱり傍にいられるだけで嬉しい。
translation:
It was fun, after all.
That's the most important thing.
I'm just happy being by his side.

japanese:
一応、同棲のシミュレーションをするって理由で
部屋替えしたはずなんだけど？
translation:
We changed rooms
because you wanted to simulate living together, right?

japanese:
もちろん、それもちゃんとできたよ。
同じ部屋で過ごしてわかったこともあった。
translation:
Of course, and we did that too.
I learned some things
by spending time in the same room as him.

japanese:
みんなのおかげで、
すごく有意義な時間を過ごせたと思う。
translation:
Thanks to everyone,
I think I had a really meaningful time.

japanese:
そっか！
よかったね、一花。
translation:
Is that so!
That's great, Ichika.

japanese: でも、まだまだ勉強しないといけないことも多いなぁ。
translation: But there are still a lot of things I need to learn.

japanese: 勉強ですか？
translation: Learn?

japanese:
うん。
実際に同棲することになったら
フータロー君に料理作ってあげたいな、とか。
translation:
Yes. Like cooking for Futaro-kun
when we actually start living together.

japanese:
なんて言えばいいのかな。
傍にいられるだけで嬉しいのも本当だけど――
translation:
I don't know what to say. I'm just happy
being by his side%p-2;――

japanese:
傍にいて、お互いにお互いの気持ちを重ねて、
埋め合っていけたら、もっともっと先に進める。
translation:
But, if we can be together, 
understand and support each other,
we can move forward even more.

japanese:
嬉しいからって、
そこで立ち止まっていちゃダメなんだ。
translation: We can't just stand still because we're happy now.

japanese:
というわけだからさ。
二乃、今度、料理教えて。
translation: So, Nino, can you teach me how to cook next time?

japanese: いいけど、授業料は高いわよ？
translation: Sure, but my tuition fee is high, you know?

japanese:
おおっと、そうきますか。
じゃあ、もっと女優の仕事頑張らないと。
translation:
Oh, is that so?
Then I have to work harder as an actress.

japanese:
ああ、いたいた！
お前ら、どこ行ってたんだ。
translation:
Hey, there you are!
You guys went somewhere, didn't you?

japanese:
えー？
お兄ちゃんがどっか行っちゃったんだよ。
translation:
Eh? Big bro,
you're the one who went somewhere.

japanese:
いや、記念品によさそうなものを見かけて
チェックしてたら、お前らが先に
行っちまってたんだよ。
translation:
No, I was checking out some souvenirs
that looked great
and you guys had gone ahead without me.

japanese:
え？　いいもの？
なにを見つけたの？
translation:
Huh? Did you find something good?
What did you find?

japanese: それは見てのお楽しみだ。
translation: That's a surprise. You'll have to wait and see.

japanese:
お、焦らすね。
ハードル上がったよ？
translation:
Oh, you're teasing us.
The bar has been raised, I see.

japanese:
くっくっく、そのハードルを越える自信はあるぞ！
お前ら、ついてこい！
translation:
Hehehe, I'm confident I can clear that bar.
Come on, follow me!

japanese: はーい！
translation: Okay!

japanese: よーし、お手並み拝見だ！
translation: Alright, let's see what you've got!

japanese: 一花、楽しそう。
translation: Ichika looks like she's having fun.

japanese:
ええ、いまの一花の笑顔は
どんなドラマで見るものよりも輝いています。
translation:
Yes, her smile just now
is shining brighter
than anything I've seen in dramas.

japanese:
そうさせてるのがフー君なのは、
もう疑いようもないわね。
translation:
It's definitely because of Fu-kun,
there's no doubt about that.

japanese: うん……。
translation: Yeah...

japanese:
でも、一花がお姉さんなことまでは
フータローには譲らないけど。
translation:
But, I won't let Futaro
steal our sisterly relationship away.

japanese:
当然よ。
私たちが五つ子であることは、
これからも変わらないもの。
translation:
Of course not. Being quintuplets
is something that will never change for us.

japanese:
うん！
一花はずっと、私たちのお姉ちゃんだもんね。
translation:
Yeah! Ichika will always be our big sister,
forever and ever.
